response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premier product, which holds immense value to you. Our product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and unparalleled quality. Given its significance to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a generous offer that reflects the true worth of the product and aims to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to provide you with all the details you need to make an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
